item.title: 1037 NEM
item.description: score:1037 Chances: Newmont Corporation receives PNG Competition Commission clearance for the acquisition of Newcrest, indicating positive progress in their growth strategy. Investing in Newmont Corporation along with other industry-leading stocks can result in a dividend yield of 3.5%, providing potential returns for income investors.
